name: Lampad of Death's Vigil
originalText: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Lampad of Death’s Vigil can be sacrificed to pay the cost of its own ability.
You gain only 1 life, no matter how many opponents lose life.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, each opposing team loses 2 life and you gain 1 life.

text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
